data.name: Lazy Sweet Tycoon
data.detailed_description:
Welcome Tycoons!

To our Cross-Play Casual Clicker.
Free cloud saving cross-play available between Steam and iOS/Android, so you can play on the move!



Do you have what it takes to become a Candy CEO, Factory Builder and Menacing Micro-Manager?

In a sea of tactile taps, pop the profit out of the world as you manage your valuable sugar resource, energising the island as you tap. But will you be quick enough to successfully profiteer?

When you're not furiously tapping: Develop your sweet empire in this voxel world. Manage your island and employees, hire and manage transport vehicles, complete jobs and fight against other players to top the online leaderboards and be the prized No.1 CEO.



  • Invest your money with Common, Rare, Epic and Legendary Upgrades!
  • Research powerful perks and abilities
  • Develop your recipe from Plain Cookies into Edible Nanobots or Sugar Rockets
  • Build up your island with advanced tech and industry
  • Improve by upgrading your buildings from wood, to steel, to diamond and more!



  • Play your way with customisable passive and active strategies!
  • Hire or fire your staff. Boost salary or cut wages.
  • Spawn an empire of Golden Sheep or a Fleet of Planes.
  • Personalise your playstyle and optimise your factory with a vast Research Tree
  • Charter lorries, boats and planes to export your sweets across the globe!



  • Customise your island with unique themes, staff, vehicles and more
  • Get custom profile banners and borders and stand out from the crowd!
  • Play during seasonal events to unlock rare skins for your world
  • Mix and match your island to stand out from the crowd!



  • Battle your way to the all-time top with Trophy leaderboards
  • Become the most efficient CEO of the week in our PVP Efficiency Contests
  • Earn your way up, and gather medals to show off on your player profile

data.short_description: A Cross-Play Clicker where you'll Tap, Hold, and Click your way to become the No.1 CEO in our unique multiplayer contests. As you manage upgrades, jobs, vehicles, staff, your island and its inhabitants, and your powerful research facility.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
data.reviews:
“Lazy Sweet Tycoon will likely please fans of the genre, but there's probably also enough here to win over those who've sworn never to touch an idle game again.”
Pocket Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
